paper.title: Research on the AID Measurement Based on Improved SVM Algorithm
paper.abstract: The agricultural information level is on the initial stage in Hebei province, so we should pay more attention to its construction. And on this basis we can rind out the influencing factors and corresponding countermeasures. To evaluate the agricultural information degree in Hebei province scientifically and accurately, this paper establish the agricultural information degree (AID) evaluation model based on self-adapting regression SVM, through establishing agricultural information degree index system, use several SVM classifier series portfolio, solve the problems that the training samples' category and quantity are imbalance, and the data is interfered. Experimental results show that the method improved the evaluating accuracy and efficiency of the agricultural information degree.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究基于改进SVM算法的农业信息化程度评估模型，其应用场景为农业信息化建设，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
